TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hbun, title = Hbun, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hbun} }

S.FORM: Hbun Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Hbun a niyaro', 69 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 180 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 64% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 116 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 36% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 64 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 62%, roma 3%.

Hbon Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Hbon a niyaro', 69 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 180 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 64% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 116 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 36% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 64 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 62%, roma 3%.
